general.title: General

update.title: App Updates
update.description: Check for updates on launch and download automatically.

permission.title: Permissions
permission.accessibilityGranted: Enabling Accessibility permission allows the app to read text you select on the screen.
permission.accessibilityNotGranted: For optimal text selection, please enable Accessibility permission in <0>System Settings</0>. Or activate <1>Clipboard Fallback</1>.
permission.administratorGranted: Enabling Administrator permission allows the app to read text you select on the screen.
permission.administratorNotGranted: For optimal text selection, please run this app with Administrator permission. To do this, <0>Open installation folder</0>. Or enable <1>Clipboard Fallback</1>.

general.clipboardFallbackDescription: If this option is not enabled, you will not be able to use this app in applications such as Chrome.

providers.title: Providers
providers.deleteModelConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{modelName}}?
providers.name: Name

chat.title: Chat
chat.streamingDescription: Show responses as they are being generated

hotkeys.title: Hotkeys
hotkeys.customDescription: Configure up to 3 custom keyboard shortcuts with personalized prompts
hotkeys.defaultDescription: Use default hotkey to open blank chat window.
